alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Windy Conditions Expected Into Early Evening... West winds will increase through the late afternoon hours as a cold front moves through the area. Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph are expected, with the higher gusts in open areas or higher terrain in southwest Wisconsin and southeast Minnesota. Scattered showers will also be around through early evening. The more vigorous showers could cause locally higher wind gusts. After about 7 pm, the winds and showers are expected to diminish with a quieter overnight on tap. Take action now to tie down or secure any objects that may blow around in these winds.
